alert.note: Alert for Greene; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 1:02AM CDT until July 13 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Wright County in southwestern Missouri... Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 102 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Niangua to near Marshfield to 6 miles west of Strafford to near Walnut Grove, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, Republic, Marshfield, Battlefield, Willard, Mountain Grove, Rogersville, Strafford, Seymour, Ash Grove, Fair Grove, Mansfield, Fordland, Walnut Grove, Norwood, Hartville, Niangua, Duncan, Brookline and Diggins. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 62 and 105. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
